1. First step: create a `.dotfiles` directory at the `~` level :
  ```bash
  mkdir ~/.dotfiles
  ```
2. [[mv]] configuration files inside this new directory.
3. create symbolic links. example with `~/.bashrc`
  ```bash
  ln -sf ~/.dotfiles/.bashrc ~/.bashrc
  ```

### Positron

To configure Positron I use extension avalaible on [Open VSX](https://open-vsx.org/) and a hand crafted `settings.json`.

#### User Interface

https://open-vsx.org/extension/Catppuccin/catppuccin-vsc : Specifies the color theme used in the workbench.

https://open-vsx.org/extension/Catppuccin/catppuccin-vsc-icons : Specifies the file icon theme used in the workbench or 'null' to not show any file icons.
Using the Catpuccin theme
to hide arrows in the **Explorer** view

```json
  "workbench.colorTheme": "Catppuccin Mocha",
  "workbench.iconTheme": "catppuccin-mocha",
  "catppuccin-icons.hidesExplorerArrows": true,
```
